marklogic.body:
@avclub-af93a69093757cf8412bb476bb1b9e74:disqus - everybody keeps forgetting this is a J.J. Abrams show, which starts fairly conventional for a show with a somewhat strange premise, then starts pulling the rug out from under you on a regular basis as the mythology kicks in. Did you really think ALIAS would turn out to be anything other than "Felicity as a CIA Agent" from the early going, or FRINGE would be more than "X-FILES knockoff"?
You guys keep Acting like Abrams is some talentless hack ::Cough!:: CASTLE!: ::Cough!:: who slavishly follows the clichÃ©'d drama beats and has never surprised you, ever.
